subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch won his third consecutive race on Nascar’s Nationwide Series, holding off Marcos Ambrose by less than a second in the Corona Mexico 200 in Mexico City. Busch passed Scott Pruett on the 72nd of 80 laps to take the lead. Pruett finished third, followed by Carl Edwards.
